title: Bella Canvas Jersey Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt (3005)
features: Made in the USA or Imported
description: 3005 BELLA+CANVAS Unisex Jersey Short-Sleeve V-Neck Tee This BELLA+CANVAS updated unisex essential fits like a well-loved favorite, featuring a classic V-neck, short sleeves and superior combed and ring-spun cotton that acts as the best blank canvas for printing. Available in a variety of solid, marble, neon, and heather colors. solid colors: 30-single 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (4.2 oz.) ash: 30-single 99% combed and ring-spun cotton/1% polyester (4.2 oz.) athletic heather: 30-single 90% combed and ring-spun cotton/10% polyester (4.2 oz.) all other heather colors: 30-single 52% combed and ring-spun cotton/48% polyester (4.2 oz.) marble colors: 30-single 91% polyester/9% combed and ring-spun cotton (4 oz.) mineral wash colors*: 32-single 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (4.4 oz.) neon colors: 40-single 52% combed and ring-spun cotton/48% polyester (3.6 oz.) slub colors: 30-single 50% polyester/37.5% combed and ring-spun cotton/12.5% rayon (4 oz.) shoulder taping side-seamed retail fit unisex sizing marble and mineral wash and slub colors available up to 2XL *each garment is unique due to the specialized washing process Sizes: XS-3XL
